data.title: HR-TM: Which Time Mgmt Status To Be Used?

qas.question: Dear All, I'm using negative time management. And the payment is through SAP HR Payroll. Which Time Management Status should I use in IT0007? Do I need to run PT60? I'm not very clear with time evaluation and its usage. Thanks.

answers.text: Hi, Following definition is from SAP HCM training guide: Employees' time data is valuated in time evaluation. Time evaluation determines planned working times and overtime, manages time accounts (flextime balances, overtime, productive hours, and so on), creates wage types (for overtime or bonus wage types, for example), updates time quotas, and checks working time provisions (such as core time violations). The time wage types created during time evaluation are valuated in Payroll. Time evaluation is carried out by a time evaluation driver called RPTIME00. The steps to be carried out by RPTIME00 are specified in a personnel calculation schema. Regards, Waqas Rashid

We have a requirement to transfer cost with special procurement key between plants which are in different Controlling areas. As per my knowledge, it is not possible; I would like have your comments on this and to know if there is any possibility. As per my knowledge, it is not possible; I would like have your comments on this and to know if there is any possibility. Regards, Regards, RK. RK.

answers.text: Hi RK Its possible.. Ensure the below things 1) Plants must fall under same Co. Area 2) Costing Variant: Activate Cross Company Code Costing in the "Assignment" tab 3) If you want to transfer the Cost Component Split, you must use the same Cost Comp Structure in both the Comp Codes Ajay M

data.title: How to Change Item Code on which there are transactions made.

qas.question: Hi All, There are around 3000 and more Items in our Data Base. The item code is given in this format. 001-001-00 001-001-01 001-001-02 - - - - - And Go On. Now we planned to Change it to SPGEN0001 This is for generator Spare part. like this we have classified each and every Item. By doing this we can Identify the Item by looking at the Item Code. And there are many Purchase documents raised on all Items which are present. Is there any query which can replace the Item codes in all the tables where ever it is present. Thankyou, Sree

answers.text: Hi, Unfortunately, once you have transactions, item codes will be locked up. There is no option to change. If you desperately need them to be changed, you have to create a new database and start it from scratch. Thanks, Gordon

But here it's allowing me to create a sales order for division 10 with 20 Division material without any error. But this should not happen. Checked in the document type VOV8 where at the Check division field 2 has been there. Please suggest

answers.text: Hi, Check the sales area in the sales document. Probably the system redetermined the sales area. Other posibility is to NOT set the flag: TVAK-SPAPO - Item Division. Regards, Demétrius

data.title: Which IDocs are best when picking with an external system interfacing to IM

qas.question: We are looking to send delivery info to an external system where mobile devices will be used to pick deliveries.WM is not being used, only IM. Our intent is to send an IDoc to the external system with delivery info and send the picking results including packing information info back to SAP IM via IDocs. We are looking to send delivery info to an external system where mobile devices will be used to pick deliveries. It appears that this can be done using several different IDocs: 1. DESADV (DELVRY05) for both output and input IDocs 2. DELORD (ORDERS05) for both output and input IDocs 3. PICKSD (SDPIOD01) for output and SDPICK (SDPIID01) and SDPACK (SDPAID01) for input IDocs Is any IDoc combination preferred over others for this external picking process with IM?Why? Any help will be greatly appreciated as we hope to implement the best solution. Thanks in advance for sharing your expertise! Is any IDoc combination preferred over others for this external picking process with IM?

answers.text: Hello, DESADV is sufficient . You can sent the pick information. Thanks Rk

data.title: How does Goods Issue know which Batches to deallocate from A/R Credit Memo?

qas.question: Hi, I am creating an addon that runs after a A/R Credit Memo is created. It creates a Goods Issue, and enters the Item Code and the Quantity from the line items on the Credit Memo into the Goods Issue. After it writes the Goods Issue to SAP, I open up the document it created and see that the line items are in there correctly, and that somehow the batches assigned to those line items are also in there. There is nothing in the code that does anything with the Batches, but somehow SAP knows which batches to work with. I haven't been able to find any info about it. Can you please help us understand what is happening? How does SAP know and make assignments to batches in line items in Goods Issues? Thank you, Mike

answers.text: Hi, Thank you both for responding It does seem that the Goods Issues are being generated by my code, which is as expected. And it does seem that the batches of the Credit Memo are reflected in IBT1 correctly. What is strange is, my code does not make any reference to the Credit Memo that was created. The only information that is being brought over from line item to line item is: Item Code Project Code Quantity Warehouse And yet, somehow the Goods Issue knows which batches to take based on this. To us, this appears like magicAnd although it's very nice, how can we know if it is reliable and consistent? Many thanks, Mike Cygnusoft Inc.

data.title: CO-PA forms: how to add a column which is a ratio

qas.question: Dear fellows, I'm trying to build a CO-PA form, which has "Product Quantity" (among other several other CO-PA value fields) as a line in the first column. In the second column, I'd like to have each of the other lines (eg. Sales Value, Discounts, etc.) divided by this "Product Quantity" (in order to have unit values). Is there anyway I can do this? Apparently, I can't use a line value in a column formula... Thanks in advance. Best Regards, Nuno

answers.text: In the report you create columns for sales value, discount and so on. In the last column you define the formula to show the unit values. The columns sales value, discount and others can be hidden. So in report you only see the two columns. It is also possible to hide the columns after the report execution. Sangram

' in C:\xampp\htdocs\sap.php:59 Stack trace: #0 C:\xampp\htdocs\sap.php(59): unknown() #1 {main} thrown inC:\xampp\htdocs\sap_test.phpon line59 Fatal error : Uncaught exception 'com_exception' with message 'Unable to lookup `PriceAfVAT': Unknown name. data.title: upcharge on those items which are not in case quantities.

qas.question: Hi..please help me finding a solution for the issue. Our business wants to charge an upcharge of 10% on all those items which are not in the case quantities. Let me explain my requirement with an example: Our business wants to sell in case quantities. Eg : A case contains 6 Jars of 1 kg each. If a customer places order for 10 Jars where case contains 6 jars, 6 jars price will be normal. But the additional 4 jars(which are not in case) will be upcharged by 10%. Similarly if customer places an order for only 5 jars(where case contains 6 jars) all the 5 jars should be upcharged by 10%. The crucial part in this scenario is the list of materials is not in fixed number and they require changes in future. The upcharge is in percentage and it should be on both under and over the case quantity. There are different materials like jars, bottles,tubes etc. and different sizes( 1kg jars,2kg jars, 3 kg jars) It is not a case of pallet surcharge.Please help me. Thanks&Regards, Chandu

answers.text: Hi chandu If the customer orders more than a case or less than a case where case contains 6 Jars of 1 kg each.then then you should charge extra 10%.That means you should assign a new reqt / Alt calc type to the condition type giving the inputs to the ABAP'er and explain him your requirement as i mentioned and also give the inputs like tables to ABAP'er to complete the task of subroutine Regards Srinath

data.title: Reg. Work Center assignment to which

qas.question: Dear experts Work center is created but it is not coming in CO08 - Operation assignment, where to be assigned after creating the Work Center. Pls help me giving the steps. Thanks Rajakumar.k

answers.text: Hi, Work center needs to be associated with a task list i.e. routing & then the same can be read in production orders or alternatively you can go to operations tab in the production tab & add your work center. So in CA01 create a routing for your material, in the operations tab, specify the work center & other details of operation as required. What is a routing... well it is basically a list of operations which you would have to perform to produce the material. Hope the above gives you some idea, check & revert if you need any additional info. Regards, Vivek

data.title: which of the area i should used in VOFM?

qas.question: Dear all, We have this requirement and we need to make use of routine to chips in our logic. Our requirement: +Based on our business requirement (i.e. upon PGI in outbound delivery, SPED trigger and create an inbound delivery. During the process of inbound creation, program takes the delivery date of the outbound delivery and add the transit time in calendar days (TVRO-TRAZTD) from the outbound delivery route the delivery date + route+. Questions: VOFM is divided into four main groups. They are Copying Requirements, Data Transfer, Requirements and Formulas. Q1 - Base on our requirement, I just don't know which of the group I should use? Q1 - Base on our requirement, I just don't know which of the group I should use? I wonder if I can create a new routine at VOFM ==> Data Transfer ==> Deliveries? I wonder if I can create a new routine at VOFM ==> Data Transfer ==> Deliveries? Thanks. tuff

answers.text: Dear Tuffy, Do not think you need to create a routine for this requirement. As per the requirement, you have to do a BDC recording of the inbound delivery creation and get the help of abaper to trigger the program which will create this inbound delivery in background with the required/copied values. Thanks & Regards, Hegal K Charles

OBject infotype will show you the name and abbrevation of business event Relationship infotype will show you the attendees, the business event type, resources type etc

data.title: If all values in a column of internal table are same ,On which basis the sorting is carried out .?

qas.question: When I apply sort function to a field(Whole column contains duplicate values) in intreral table it get sorted.But just wanted to know on which basis sorting is been done since the content is been re arranged.

answers.text: Hi, You can use the STABLE addition in sort if you want to keep the order same each time. Please read the F1 document for SORT for more details. Here is an extract - STABLEis used to perform stable sorts, which means that the relative order of rows (an order that does not change in the sort key) remains unchanged in the sort. Without theSTABLEaddition, the order is not stable and multiple sorting of a table using the same sort key can result in a different order each time the table is sorted. STABLE STABLE Best Regards, Saurabh

data.title: How to reverse invoice/credit memo which are already been cleared

qas.question: Hi All, we have a mulitple issue related to invoice or credit memo reversal from our business. Issue raised as there are few wrong invoice being posted to some wrong vendor and following by payment happened in prior year. somehow business noticed the payment happened to wrong vendor and they posted the credit memo just, to make knock off the Accounts,which is incorrect process. Either they would have reversed the invoice before payment or they would not have posted credit memo after payment, which causing the issue. For instance: 1. Invoice posted ( period April 2012/2013/2014)- there 4 invoice GRIR Ac Dr-1000 Vendor X Cr-1000 2. Payment processed(check payment) Vendor X Ac DR-1000 Bank Ac Cr-1000 After the wrong payment, check processed as void and reconciled at bank level. 3.Again Credit memo posted-Now Business realized the vendor is wrongly posted, it needs reverse, so they posted in 2015. Vendor X Dr 1000 GRIR Ac Cr 1000 4. Now through F.13 GRIR is cleared (automatic monthly batch job picked the GRIR ac). clearing document holds many other Fi doc(approx 2000), including this. so here Vendor is Open GRIR line item is cleared So now requiremnt is to reverse the credit memo and invoice as well in SAP end. we thought of FBRA, to clearing doc, but not possible as it is clearing doc for 2000 docs approx. So anybody has any thought on this, please advise asap, as this is one of the critical item to be addressed asap.

answers.text: No accepted solution found

data.title: Business One Reporting Tools. Which tool to use?

qas.question: I recently signed on with a new company with the task of developing all of their reporting. They have Crystal, BusinessObjects and Xcelcius. My first task is to generate financial reports such as Balance Sheets and Income Statements followed shortly by Sales reports such as sales by sales rep by product line and a running variance of sales by quarter. I spent the last week ramping up on the reporting tools available but would appreciate opinions on the reporting tools and what they are best suited for. Thanks in advance for any advice. Linda.

answers.text: Hi Linda, Welcome you post on the forum. Only Crystal Report on your listing is a proper tool for the task. BusinessObjects is not a reporting tool. Xcelcius is for dash broad. What else have you tried? Thanks, Gordon

data.title: Which Patch? 2007A SP00 PL:42 to latest SP01

qas.question: We are trying to figure out which file we need to use to upgrade from 2007A SP00 PL42 to SP01 There are two files that looked pertinent in the support portal. Hotfiix 2007A SP01 PL05 (file B12007A0105HF_02-10003612.ZIP dated 08.07.2009) and 2007A SP01 (file B12007A01_05-10003612.ZIP dated 23.06.2009) The both say this in the Administratorguide_SQL.pdf 4.1 Upgrade Versions Note Install the SAP Business One 2007 A SP01, upgrade package before installing any latest patch. You can upgrade to this version from the following previous releases: SAP Business One 2005 A SP01 (any given patch level) SAP Business One 2005 A (any given patch level) SAP Business One 2004 A (any given patch level) SAP Business One 2004 C (any given patch level) SAP Business One 6.5 SP01 (any given patch level) SAP Business One 7.6 SP01 (any given patch level) Which file do we use? And why does the Administrator guide not mention to use either of these files to patch from 2007A (any given patch level)?

answers.text: If I were you, I would pick the latest in date stamp. You also need to check the file size. It would not be too small. Thanks, Gordon

data.title: completing PGI which account will generate

qas.question: Hi All, Please let me know after completing PGI which accounting documents will be generate. aditya.

answers.text: Hi, Based on design the following documents will be generated After PGI process. 1. Materials Document 2. Accounting document Materials document will be updated if you are updated the valuation and quantity with the combination Materials type and plant. Accounting document will be updated if you maintain any valuation price in materials master. The following accounting will be hit: Inventory A/C - Credited COGS A/C - Debited.

We continue to create a TO from the OBD via LT03. During this step the user accidantly pick HU 1000007355 instead. This resulting in TO confirmed and DO is pack with HU 1000007355. We can't delete the assignment of the HU as the system prompt 'Handling Unit has status - cannot be changed'. We also try to use LT01 mvmt 999 to move the HU From interim storage type 922 to another interim storage type 923, it says 'HU 1000007355 has been as to object 01 <DO Number>, no TO Can be created. How do we undo this mistake?

qas.question: Hello All, I have created an account in F9K2 for TWD currency .There was one posting order and then it was reversed .Now company wants to change the currency to USD for the same account in F9K2 .But the currency field is greyed out (Cannot be chnaged ) .I could change the currency for the same account in test system where there was no posting or reversal. Any one had this kind of scenario .Please update with you valuable solution. Thanks

answers.text: Hi, Any one has faced this scenario.Please update . Thnx

data.title: Table which record purchasing doc. header change

answers.text: Hi ely, I dont know acutal table where it stores the data, u can use version management & try to find out table, since here the changes will be recorded. Regards Rang

data.title: Track Leave Request which is not processed

qas.question: Hi, When an employee applies a leave, a work item will go to his superior's ESS Inbox. After Superior approves, Absence will be updated into table PA2006. But before it gets approved, I need to know how many Leave Requests have been applied ? Thanks. jey

answers.text: Hello Jey, please use transaction ptarq. There you can select and view your "sent" requests. regards, Markus

data.title: Personnel area creation for existing entity which is moving.

qas.question: Hi Experts, Hope you are doing great! I had gone through lot of articles on personnel area in SAP Human Capital Management. Our client is shifting the organization from one place to other. For historic record they want to maintian the data text of the personnel area. Is there any possibility in SAP to rewrite the text for the new place. To make you understand clearly here is the example: Example: Existing personnel area: BA12: ABC Pvt. Ltd., Gandhinagar, Delhi. This location is existed from 01.01.2003 till 30.04.2015 The whole entity ABC Pvt. Ltd., Gandhinagar, Delhi is shifted to ABC Pvt. Ltd., MG Road, Delhi. The client want both the records in SAP. 01.01.2003 till 30.04.2015 ABC Pvt. Ltd., Gandhinagar, Delhi. 01.05.2015 till 31.12.9999 ABC Pvt. Ltd., MG Road, Delhi. Is there any possibility to delimit the old record and rename the personnel area? (or) Creating a personnel area is the only solution. Please suggest if any option available. Looking forward to hear from you. Thanks in advance. Regards, Triven Kumar Reddy.

answers.text: Hi Triven, You can define validity areas for the personnel areas as per new functionality available in ECC6, by activating the switch ADMIN DELIM, You can delimit the personnel areas, but Personnel areas Text will be changed as soon as you have given the old name.. i mean personnel areas will not have two different texts depend upon the validity..it will have always one. I think you will have to create a new personnel area . that works. Regards Sriram
